Cut my hair yesterday, good game,
I have only 64 hours in the game but I am already addicted it was worth it to buy this game.

A lot of people are too scared to play this game at the beginning, and I might have been one of them. Once you play a few times though, the scares are funny and exciting rather than you know, scary. I love the adrenaline that this game gives me, and I wish more people had the courage to play it. The best part is, the better you get, the harder it gets, so chances are this game won't ever get boring.

I absolutely adore this game.
